                       Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For some the belief in God brings hope, faith, and a sense of purpose.  But a 
growing number of people are speaking out about the opposite belief -- that 
there is no god.  For some this is a slap in the face.  The more extreme think 
it should be punishable by death.  But Atheists insist it&#039;s time to &#039;spread the 
word&#039;.
